Articles.Content:
My challenge is to build the doctor who carrier the valiant,

damned aerospace is recommended

also

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6430.0

Edit :antigrav allowed

heres a link to google images

http://www.google.co.uk/search?q=doctor+who+flying+aircraft+carrier&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&um=1&ie=UTF-8&hl=en&tbm=isch&source=og&sa=N&tab=wi&ei=dTP_T91Aw6nRBdGT7I8J&biw=1280&bih=582&sei=eDP_T-vtM6On0QWhlLWGBw
I was hoping you meant the Vickers Valiant. Darnit. =P

I have actually tried to remake that picture you linked us to... however you cannot land on it with other craft from another launch, and no matter how hard you try a perfectly balanced ship with a bridge like that on one side would be impossibru.
edit an engine so it applies just the right amount of thrust to balance the control tower
Damn, that\'s near impossible. I did build one before however... before my hard drive crashed on me.

edit an engine so it applies just the right amount of thrust to balance the control tower

ASAS only vectors angle of thrust, but not the thrust itself - making it impossible for the real thing.
ok im going to allow the antigrav plugin

ok im going to allow the antigrav plugin

Now this got serious... but I\'m on vacation...

I\'ll have a go at this one, but first:

This might help people out, or not...

I\'ve built a hovering platform that flies at 10km and can launch a craft that will fly off of it. The problem is that when you build the thing, it is balanced one way, and after you launch the child craft it is balanced a completely different way and there is no autopilot yet to fly it and keep it level. You can have enough fuel on board for it to be up there for hours but it\'ll flip over because the balance is all wrong and we don\'t have enough axes of control.

Best place to look for images in ModDB - often times someone will be making a mod about it and post 3D images

http://www.moddb.com/mods/doctor-who-invasion-of-earth/images/modified-valiant2

Damn I built the Helicarrier from the Avengers movie and the one from the comic books but I guess I lose this competition...durn.

(Just kidding I\'m not that awesome. Interesting idea tho-bonus points if someone can land a craft on the deck )

Alright back from vacation. Since I could make things that large with gravity, imagine them without it.

Will be back soon. 8)
If you scroll down on the google images that you gave us.. Theres a person that looks like they are trying to pop a pimple on somebody\'s back..
